name: The Lord of the Roads
storyline:
The Monsters are invading.
But you are not alone.
You can defeat the monsters with your party!
Rescue fellows and make a party.
"The lord of the roads" is humankind's last hope.
Now The lord of the roads' real adventure begins.
summary: The Lord of the Roads is a combination of a shooter game mixed with a RPG game. Featuring numerous unique in game missions, 10 upgradable characters, simple controls, a party system, and various monsters and strong bosses.
